context_of_use: This use case allows users to download report files for offline access and analysis.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to access reports for personal use
user: wants to analyze data offline
description: Allows users to download report files for offline access and analysis.
triggering_event: User requests to download a report.
assumptions: Users have the necessary permissions to download reports.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to download reports for offline access.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of reports available for download.
main_flow: 1. customer/user requests to download a report → System verifies user permissions.
2. System retrieves the requested report → System prepares the report for download.
3. System initiates the download of the report file → User receives the report file.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If the user does not have permission, then System displays an error message and denies the download.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the report is not available, then System displays an error message indicating the report is unavailable.
